background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #d593ff 0%, #bc75f3 11%, #9019f0 19%, #9215f2 27%, #9215f2 100%); /* FF3.6+ */
background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,#d593ff), color-stop(11%,#bc75f3), color-stop(19%,#9019f0), color-stop(27%,#9215f2), color-stop(100%,#9215f2)); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */

background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #d593ff 0%,#bc75f3 11%,#9019f0 19%,#9215f2 27%,#9215f2 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */
background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #d593ff 0%,#bc75f3 11%,#9019f0 19%,#9215f2 27%,#9215f2 100%); /* IE10+ */
background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #d593ff 0%,#bc75f3 11%,#9019f0 19%,#9215f2 27%,#9215f2 100%); /* W3C */
